welcome_message_body: Welcome to Ciudad del Este, where the vibrant culture and stunning natural beauty await you. Known for its bustling shopping scene and stunning landscapes, we invite you to explore and savor all that our charming city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!

restaurants.name: Gouranga restaurant vegetariano
restaurants.description: Gouranga restaurant vegetariano is a vegan and vegetarian restaurant located in Ciudad del Este.

terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
